WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

When using chirp in razor views (js minifier is YUI), if I include an external script, content of script element becomes 

/* error = Value cannot be null.
Parameter name: javaScript */

<script type="text/javascript" src="my-awesome-script.js"></script>

becomes

<script type="text/javascript" src="my-awesome-script.js">/* error = Value cannot be null.
Parameter name: javaScript */</script>

Sorry for not fixing this, but i have no Hg experience.

I believe problem can be easily fixed by testing is "code" variable is empty in ViewEngine.Transform

sincerely
WorkItem.Summary: ViewEngine + YUI Js Compressor + Script Tag w/ src = error
